title: DDCO PYQs
content: seniors if you have any PYQs for ddco or any drive link can u please share it , i didnt get any PYQs in the discord . pls 🙏

comments.body:
I lost my credentials 🥲
But thank you 🙏, I will ask my friends to download and send it .
Check your email, your credentials should be there. Or you can always reach out to the librarian to reset your credentials.
Oh I will check it , thanks
guys I have sent ddco pyqs 10000 times in isa group 😭
I am not in the isa group 🥲😅

Hey is there any way I can join that group?

Please help me with this,im trying to get in since sem 1 and I never managed to get in
Thr group is always full, but I will surely let you know if someone leaves :)
